title.default: Empower staff to deliver better services
title.fr: Empower staff to deliver better services(FR)

description.default: Make sure that staff have access to the tools, training and technologies they need. Empower the team to make decisions throughout the design, build and operation of the service.
description.fr: Make sure that staff have access to the tools, training and technologies they need. Empower the team to make decisions throughout the design, build and operation of the service.(FR)

title.default: On our team, members self-organize and self-manage work through self-assigning tasks.
title.fr: On our team, members self-organize and self-manage work through self-assigning tasks.(FR)

title.default: Within our team we can openly discuss challenges and new ideas without fear of blame or reproach.
title.fr: Within our team we can openly discuss challenges and new ideas without fear of blame or reproach.(FR)

title.default: Team members feel safe to challenge the status quo and propose new ideas.
title.fr: Team members feel safe to challenge the status quo and propose new ideas.(FR)

title.default: We value and incorporate learning as part of our daily work.
title.fr: We value and incorporate learning as part of our daily work.(FR)

title.default: Team members understand how their work contributes to business outcomes.
title.fr: Team members understand how their work contributes to business outcomes.(FR)

title.default: We can choose the tools we use to deliver our product, service or other outcome.
title.fr: We can choose the tools we use to deliver our product, service or other outcome.(FR)

title.default: Our management actively removes impediments and blockers that prevent us from delivering value.
title.fr: Our management actively removes impediments and blockers that prevent us from delivering value.(FR)

title.default: Progress in making useful improvements to our work is slowed down by approvals.
title.fr: Progress in making useful improvements to our work is slowed down by approvals.(FR)

title.default: We have access to environments to experiment with new approaches, tools, or solutions.
title.fr: We have access to environments to experiment with new approaches, tools, or solutions.(FR)

title.default: Team members can openly provide feedback and feel it is valued.
title.fr: Team members can openly provide feedback and feel it is valued.(FR)

title.default: Our team treats failures as opportunities to improve and learn.
title.fr: Our team treats failures as opportunities to improve and learn.(FR)

title.default: Our management team directly assigns work to members of the team.
title.fr: Our management team directly assigns work to members of the team.(FR)

title.default: Build in accessibility from the start
title.fr: Build in accessibility from the start(FR)

description.default: Services should meet or exceed accessibility standards. Users with distinct needs should be engaged from the outset to ensure what is delivered will work for everyone.
description.fr: Services should meet or exceed accessibility standards. Users with distinct needs should be engaged from the outset to ensure what is delivered will work for everyone.(FR)

title.default: Our team continuously considers the lowest levels of digital skill, confidence and access as part of our service and platform design.
title.fr: Our team continuously considers the lowest levels of digital skill, confidence and access as part of our service and platform design.(FR)

title.default: Our team understands how to make our services or products accessible.
title.fr: Our team understands how to make our services or products accessible.(FR)

title.default: Our team considers accessibility throughout the service design process.
title.fr: Our team considers accessibility throughout the service design process.(FR)

title.default: Research and testing are conducted to ensure that our service is accessible to people of all abilities no matter how, where or when they access the service.
title.fr: Research and testing are conducted to ensure that our service is accessible to people of all abilities no matter how, where or when they access the service.(FR)

title.default: Our team conducts ongoing research with users with low-level digital literacy, people with disabilities, and people from different cultural and linguistic backgrounds or regions.
title.fr: Our team conducts ongoing research with users with low-level digital literacy, people with disabilities, and people from different cultural and linguistic backgrounds or regions.(FR)

title.default: Our team implements automated accessibility checks for our services.
title.fr: Our team implements automated accessibility checks for our services.(FR)

title.default: Accessibility compliance is only added at the end of the development cycle in order to pass compliance checks or audits.
title.fr: Accessibility compliance is only added at the end of the development cycle in order to pass compliance checks or audits.(FR)

title.default: Our team has specific standards we test against to ensure service accessibility.
title.fr: Our team has specific standards we test against to ensure service accessibility.(FR)

title.default: Use open standards and solutions
title.fr: Use open standards and solutions(FR)

description.default: Leverage open standards and embrace leading practices, including the use of open source software where appropriate. Design for services and platforms that are seamless for Canadians to use no matter what device or channel they are using.
description.fr: Leverage open standards and embrace leading practices, including the use of open source software where appropriate. Design for services and platforms that are seamless for Canadians to use no matter what device or channel they are using.(FR)

title.default: When searching for a new product, service or solution, our team considers open source solutions.
title.fr: When searching for a new product, service or solution, our team considers open source solutions.(FR)

title.default: Our team prioritizes solutions that use open standards or open source solutions over other options.
title.fr: Our team prioritizes solutions that use open standards or open source solutions over other options.(FR)

title.default: Team members contribute back to the open source communities whose work we use.
title.fr: Team members contribute back to the open source communities whose work we use.(FR)

title.default: Our services are designed to be interoperable with other services.
title.fr: Our services are designed to be interoperable with other services.(FR)

title.default: Our work is highly dependent upon vendors, consultants, or closed-source proprietary software.
title.fr: Our work is highly dependent upon vendors, consultants, or closed-source proprietary software.(FR)

title.default: Our service supports users on any device, from anywhere and at any time.
title.fr: Our service supports users on any device, from anywhere and at any time.(FR)

title.default: Our team makes our work openly accessible to the community through open source licenses.
title.fr: Our team makes our work openly accessible to the community through open source licenses.(FR)

title.default: Our chosen solution does not limit our ability to share it with others (e.g. other governments, other jurisdictions, community groups, etc.)
title.fr: Our chosen solution does not limit our ability to share it with others (e.g. other governments, other jurisdictions, community groups, etc.)(FR)

title.default: Our team is allowed to use open source solutions.
title.fr: Our team is allowed to use open source solutions.(FR)

title.default: Design with users
title.fr: Design with users(FR)

description.default: Research with users to understand their needs and the problems we want to solve. Conduct ongoing testing with users to guide design and development.
description.fr: Research with users to understand their needs and the problems we want to solve. Conduct ongoing testing with users to guide design and development.(FR)

title.default: Our team includes, or has direct access to, the expertise required to conduct ongoing user research and usability testing.
title.fr: Our team includes, or has direct access to, the expertise required to conduct ongoing user research and usability testing.(FR)

title.default: We have processes or tools in place to gather feedback, including anonymously.
title.fr: We have processes or tools in place to gather feedback, including anonymously.(FR)

title.default: Our team uses regular feedback from users to help design or redesign our service(s).
title.fr: Our team uses regular feedback from users to help design or redesign our service(s).(FR)

title.default: Our team builds our service based on detailed requirements outlined in documentation.
title.fr: Our team builds our service based on detailed requirements outlined in documentation.(FR)

title.default: Our team conducts user research before deciding how to implement the service.
title.fr: Our team conducts user research before deciding how to implement the service.(FR)

title.default: We test our systems with a range of users, with varying needs, from varying locations, and from diverse backgrounds.
title.fr: We test our systems with a range of users, with varying needs, from varying locations, and from diverse backgrounds.(FR)

title.default: User needs and feedback are considered when defining and measuring our key service metrics.
title.fr: User needs and feedback are considered when defining and measuring our key service metrics.(FR)

title.default: Our team prioritizes features or tasks based on what will provide the most value to our users.
title.fr: Our team prioritizes features or tasks based on what will provide the most value to our users.(FR)

title.default: Our team uses automation to anticipate and detect operational or quality issues before our users tell us.
title.fr: Our team uses automation to anticipate and detect operational or quality issues before our users tell us.(FR)

title.default: Do you look at other government services to try and ensure consistency from a user perspective?
title.fr: Do you look at other government services to try and ensure consistency from a user perspective?(FR)

title.default: Collaborate widely
title.fr: Collaborate widely(FR)

description.default: Create multidisciplinary teams with the range of skills needed to deliver a common goal. Share and collaborate in the open. Identify and create partnerships which help deliver value to users.
description.fr: Create multidisciplinary teams with the range of skills needed to deliver a common goal. Share and collaborate in the open. Identify and create partnerships which help deliver value to users.(FR)

title.default: Our team is multidisciplinary, with the skills and capabilities required to fully deliver our service to users.
title.fr: Our team is multidisciplinary, with the skills and capabilities required to fully deliver our service to users.(FR)

title.default: Our team is active in communities of practice, events or groups that pertain to the areas of expertise of team members.
title.fr: Our team is active in communities of practice, events or groups that pertain to the areas of expertise of team members.(FR)

title.default: We identify and collaborate with other teams inside or outside of our organization, including other levels of government, other governments, the public, or private sector organizations, who have done or are doing similar work.
title.fr: We identify and collaborate with other teams inside or outside of our organization, including other levels of government, other governments, the public, or private sector organizations, who have done or are doing similar work.(FR)

title.default: Our team documents any APIs for our service using modern and common protocols and standards and provides examples of their use.
title.fr: Our team documents any APIs for our service using modern and common protocols and standards and provides examples of their use.(FR)

title.default: Data from performance monitoring tools is used to inform business decisions.
title.fr: Data from performance monitoring tools is used to inform business decisions.(FR)

title.default: Our team relies on tickets or handoffs to manage collaboration between internal stakeholders or teams.
title.fr: Our team relies on tickets or handoffs to manage collaboration between internal stakeholders or teams.(FR)

title.default: Our team connects regularly with other related teams to understand how decisions about our service impact other teams, and how decisions made by other teams impact our own service.
title.fr: Our team connects regularly with other related teams to understand how decisions about our service impact other teams, and how decisions made by other teams impact our own service.(FR)

title.default: Iterate and improve frequently
title.fr: Iterate and improve frequently(FR)

description.default: Develop services using agile, iterative and user-centred methods. Continuously improve in response to user needs. Try new things, start small and scale up.
description.fr: Develop services using agile, iterative and user-centred methods. Continuously improve in response to user needs. Try new things, start small and scale up.(FR)

title.default: We have processes in place to prioritize and implement feedback from peers, stakeholders and end users.
title.fr: We have processes in place to prioritize and implement feedback from peers, stakeholders and end users.(FR)

title.default: When a new or updated service or feature is being created, our team understands the minimum requirements for the system to be of value to users.
title.fr: When a new or updated service or feature is being created, our team understands the minimum requirements for the system to be of value to users.(FR)

title.default: Our team experiments with new approaches based on team reflections, lessons learned and user feedback.
title.fr: Our team experiments with new approaches based on team reflections, lessons learned and user feedback.(FR)

title.default: Our team collects metrics throughout the development and life cycle of the service in order to improve it.
title.fr: Our team collects metrics throughout the development and life cycle of the service in order to improve it.(FR)

title.default: When resolving problems, our team dedicates time to identify the root cause of the issue and address it.
title.fr: When resolving problems, our team dedicates time to identify the root cause of the issue and address it.(FR)

title.default: Our team inspects, adapts and automates our processes to deliver value to users faster.
title.fr: Our team inspects, adapts and automates our processes to deliver value to users faster.(FR)

title.default: Our team has access to environments and resources to allow for rapid prototyping while initial requirements are being identified.
title.fr: Our team has access to environments and resources to allow for rapid prototyping while initial requirements are being identified.(FR)

title.default: Our team embraces learning about and using new digital skills, approaches and tools to incorporate into our daily work.
title.fr: Our team embraces learning about and using new digital skills, approaches and tools to incorporate into our daily work.(FR)

title.default: Our team shares our work only once it has been finalized and approved.
title.fr: Our team shares our work only once it has been finalized and approved.(FR)

title.default: Our team openly reviews processes and procedures to identify efficiencies.
title.fr: Our team openly reviews processes and procedures to identify efficiencies.(FR)

title.default: Our team must wait for the project to be approved and funded before we can get access to environments to begin experimenting with solutions.
title.fr: Our team must wait for the project to be approved and funded before we can get access to environments to begin experimenting with solutions.(FR)

title.default: Our team fully architects the service delivery solution before starting to build.
title.fr: Our team fully architects the service delivery solution before starting to build.(FR)

title.default: Address security and privacy risks
title.fr: Address security and privacy risks(FR)

description.default: Take a balanced approach to managing risk by implementing appropriate privacy and security measures. Make security measures frictionless so that they do not place a burden on users.
description.fr: Take a balanced approach to managing risk by implementing appropriate privacy and security measures. Make security measures frictionless so that they do not place a burden on users.(FR)

title.default: Our team considers security and privacy from the beginning of the service design process and as part of continuous iteration and improvement.
title.fr: Our team considers security and privacy from the beginning of the service design process and as part of continuous iteration and improvement.(FR)

title.default: Our team ensures that security and privacy legal and policy requirements are respected while prioritizing service delivery and user experience.
title.fr: Our team ensures that security and privacy legal and policy requirements are respected while prioritizing service delivery and user experience.(FR)

title.default: Security measures are frictionless so that they do not place a burden on users.
title.fr: Security measures are frictionless so that they do not place a burden on users.(FR)

title.default: Our team has privacy and security knowledge and understanding as a competency within the team.
title.fr: Our team has privacy and security knowledge and understanding as a competency within the team.(FR)

title.default: The service has automated security checks and privacy protections, including role-based access and audit functions along with the associated processes.
title.fr: The service has automated security checks and privacy protections, including role-based access and audit functions along with the associated processes.(FR)

title.default: There are procedures and processes in place to quickly respond to security or privacy breaches or incidents.
title.fr: There are procedures and processes in place to quickly respond to security or privacy breaches or incidents.(FR)

title.default: Our team relies on security through obscurity, hiding services or information rather than improving the security posture of the service.
title.fr: Our team relies on security through obscurity, hiding services or information rather than improving the security posture of the service.(FR)

title.default: Our team engages an ATIP officer to ensure on-going compliance with applicable legislation and policy requirements.
title.fr: Our team engages an ATIP officer to ensure on-going compliance with applicable legislation and policy requirements.(FR)
